oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: ||kabbo (father-in-law of /han=kass'o) was a Mantiss man (i.e. believed to possess these insects). By /han=kass'o (L VIII.-23. 8033). 1) ||kabbo is spelt '||khabbo' in the title of this story, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-23.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ||kabbo ('Oud Jantje Tooren'), a 'Mantis's man'
